General.Name: MD Medical Group Investments Plc
General.Description: MD Medical Group Investments Plc, an investment holding company, provides healthcare services in Russia. The company offers a range of services in the areas of obstetrics and gynaecology, fertility and IVF treatment, and pediatrics, as well as other medical services, including surgery, urology, traumatology, cardiology, oncology, etc. It also holds trademarks; retails pharmaceutics; and provides assistance and management services. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Nicosia, Cyprus. MD Medical Group Investments Plc is a subsidiary of MD Medical Holding Limited.
